adjectives.description: ultraconservative (comparative more ultraconservative, superlative most ultraconservative)

examples: The John Birch Society is an ultraconservative political group in the USA.

entries.meaning: A person or group with extremely conservative views.
examples: For example, as pope, Francis challenges the ultraconservatives in the Church to be ultrainclusive of people whom other popes never bothered to embrace:  […]
